files.patch:
@@ -1,1 +1,1 @@
-(1) renamed adler32.c -> zadler32.c, zcrc32c -> zcrc32.c
+Changes from zlib 1.2.13
@@ -3,3 +3,1 @@
-(2) zconf.h:
-    - added _LP64 to make uLong a 32-bit int on 64-bit platform
-    uLong -> 32-bit int
+(1) renamed adler32.c -> zadler32.c, crc32c -> zcrc32.c
@@ -7,90 +5,0 @@
---------------------------
-35,37d10
-< /* for _LP64 */
-< #include <sys/types.h>
-<
-421,424d393
-<
-< #ifdef _LP64
-< typedef unsigned int  uLong;  /* 32 bits or more */
-< #else
-426d394
-< #endif
---------------------------
-
-(3) updated crc32.c/crc32(), crc32_z()
-   unsigned long      -> uLong
-
---------------------------
-
-226,227c202,203
-< uLong ZEXPORT crc32_z(crc, buf, len)
-<     uLong crc;
----
-> unsigned long ZEXPORT crc32_z(crc, buf, len)
->     unsigned long crc;
-244c220
-<             return (uLong)crc32_little(crc, buf, len);
----
->             return crc32_little(crc, buf, len);
-246c222
-<             return (uLong)crc32_big(crc, buf, len);
----
->             return crc32_big(crc, buf, len);
-261,262c237,238
-< uLong ZEXPORT crc32(crc, buf, len)
-<     uLong crc;
----
-> unsigned long ZEXPORT crc32(crc, buf, len)
->     unsigned long crc;
-
---------------------------
-
-(4) gzread.c
-
---------------------------
-343c319
-<             n = (unsigned)len;
----
->             n = len;
-424c400
-<     len = (unsigned)gz_read(state, buf, len);
----
->     len = gz_read(state, buf, len);
-496c472
-<     ret = (int)gz_read(state, buf, 1);
----
->     ret = gz_read(state, buf, 1);
---------------------------
-
-(5) gzwrite.c
-
---------------------------
-236c212
-<                 copy = (unsigned)len;
----
->                 copy = len;
-256c232
-<                 n = (unsigned)len;
----
->                 n = len;
---------------------------
-
-(6) deflate.c  #8184306
-
-*** 503,512 ****
---- 503,514 ----
-  
-      s = (deflate_state *)strm->state;
-      s->pending = 0;
-      s->pending_out = s->pending_buf;
-  
-+     s->high_water = 0;      /* reset to its inital value 0 */
-+ 
-      if (s->wrap < 0) {
-          s->wrap = -s->wrap; /* was made negative by deflate(..., Z_FINISH); */
-      }
-      s->status =
-  #ifdef GZIP
-
-(7) deflate.c undo (6), replaced withe the official zlib repo fix see#305/#f969409
